comments.body: I may be wrong on this, but doesn't the defining the test name like this then not allow the user to target a single test with `testOnly`? For example I tried `unit/testOnly tests.MtagsEnrichmentsSuite."XtensionLspRange.encloses - single line"`, which won't work. Is there a way to do this with a space? Either way, it might be easier to follow the convention of the other tests with shorter dash seperated names in order to more easily target them.
Ah, I wasn't aware of the naming convention. I've renamed the tests.
